publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4911.1 Elizabeth Smith: Child Protectionâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-4911) in the name of Karen Whitefield, insert at end ", and further calls on the Scottish Government to acknowledge the concern about the growing number of parents in society who lack the necessary skills to bring up their children responsibly and to address this issue as a matter of urgency."
